plot: A false imprisoned war hero is sent to the moon of Jupiter to man a submarine and retrieve an earth-saving bacteria, but has to deal with his own guilt and a cheeky female scientist that insists he do it for the right reasons.
title: Europa
plot_es: A false imprisoned war hero is sent to the moon of Jupiter to man a submarine and retrieve an earth-saving bacteria, but has to deal with his own guilt and a cheeky female scientist that insists he do it for the right reasons.
plot_en: A false imprisoned war hero is sent to the moon of Jupiter to man a submarine and retrieve an earth-saving bacteria, but has to deal with his own guilt and a cheeky female scientist that insists he do it for the right reasons.
